content: the cordelia bandana cowl pattern is free on the blog here https //www madamestitch com/cordelia-crochet-bandana-cowl-pattern/ do you love the look of a shawl wrapped in front but struggle with the ends constantly falling from your shoulders the solution is here the cordelia bandana cowl combines the look of a shawl with the convenience of a cowl staying securely in place this beautiful bandana cowl is a stylish elegant accessory for any occasion appropriate for casual and evening wear alike worked in sport weight acrylic/merino wool it s lightweight and warm offering plenty of coverage and warmth on a cool autumn day a combination of granny stitch and half double crochets worked in the 3rd loop create a texture you won t be able to resist it works up quickly and you ll love wearing it construction worked in one piece with no seams begins with triangle c2c granny stitch and becomes cowl worked in rounds skill level advanced beginner/intermediate written in english using us crochet terminology stitches used chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in 3rd loop granny stitch sign up for the newsletter at https //www madamestitch com
